full_text: UNIVERSITY OF MINNESOTA GRADUATE SCHOOL MINNEAPOLIS 14 OFFICE OF THE DEAN January 18, 1951 Mr. Rex Griffin Immigration and Naturalization Service 1014 New Post Office Building St. Paul 1, Minnesota Dear Mr. Griffin: Mr. Maoling Liu received his Master of Science in Elec- trical Engineering degree from the University of Minnesota in December, 1950. The departmental decision in regard to his going on to the Ph.D. degree has not yet been made, but they recommend that he be allowed to take course work until they have definitely determined his status. Mr. Liu is registered in the winter quarter for six credits and thesis work and this has been certified a full program of graduate study by his adviser and the Graduate School. Sincerely yours, Margaret L. Davis Margaret L. Davis Assistant to the Dean 1k CC: Mr. Moore 1851 FOUNDED IN THE FAITH THAT MEN ARE ENNOBLED BY UNDERSTANDING . DEDICATED TO THE ADVANCEMENT OF LEARNING AND THE SEARCH FOR TRUTH DEVOTED TO THE INSTRUCTION OF YOUTH AND THE WELFARE OF THE STATE 1951
